mapper.insert: insert into raffle_activity_account_day( user_id, activity_id, day, day_amount, day_remain, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{day}, #{dayAmount}, #{dayRemain}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update raffle_activity_account_day set day_remain = day_remain - 1, update_time = now() where user_id = #{userId} and activity_id = #{activityId} and day = #{day} and day_remain > 0
